author: By SAM McNEIL Associated Press
title: Wuhan farmers struggle as crops wither from travel limits
description: HUANGPI, China (AP) — Stuck in the same bind as many other Chinese farmers whose crops are rotting in their fields, Jiang Yuewu is preparing to throw out a 500-ton harvest of lotus root because anti-coronavirus controls are preventing traders…
